body:
This issue will be updated to reflect the current state of [BIP324](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0324.mediawiki) integration.

PRs ready for review:
* #27993


Overall plan:
* [x] ElligatorSwift integration in Bitcoin Core: #27479 
  * [x] Dependency: ElligatorSwift support in libsecp256k1: bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1129
  * [x] Dependency: update libsecp256k1 subtree: currently part of 27479.
* [ ] Cipher suite implementation (formerly 25361):
  * [x] Support for not wasting ChaCha20 stream bytes: #26153
  * [x] Support for RFC8439 variant of ChaCha20: #27985
  * [ ] Support for incremental Poly1305 computation: #27993
  * [ ] Cipher suite: #28008
* [ ] P2P v2 transport layer (formerly 23561 and 23233): no PR yet
* [ ] P2P v2 application level integration (formerly 24545): no PR yet
* [ ] BIP324 functional tests: #24748:
   * [x] Dependency: ElligatorSwift support in functional tests: #24005
   * [x] Dependency: Field element support in functional tests: #26222
* [ ] P2P_V2 service flag support in DNS seeder: sipa/bitcoin-seeder#102
* [x] Prehistory:
  * [x] Old ChaCha20Poly1305@Bitcoin cipher: #15649
  * [x] Preparing for multiple transport layers: #16202 and #16562
  * [x] Miscellaneous fixes: #22331 #23271
  * [x] ChaCha20 performance: #24946
title: BIP324 tracking issue
